title: May the Brave Firefighter
backCoverBlurb: May is a real hero! Join him as he puts on his red helmet and drives his big fire truck to help those in need in this exciting and brave adventure.
characterDescription: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. He often looks surprised or excited with his mouth in an 'O' shape. He is wearing a yellow firefighter jacket.

pages.text: May put on his large red helmet. I am Firefighter May! he said. Can you salute like a hero?
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is wearing a large red firefighter helmet and a yellow jacket, looking very brave and focused.

pages.text: He jumped into his bright red fire truck. Wee-woo! Wee-woo! went the loud siren.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is sitting in a toy fire truck with red and blue lights flashing on top.

pages.text: The fire truck zoomed down the street. Whoosh! The wind felt fast on May's face.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is steering the fire truck with a determined and excited expression on his face.

pages.text: Oh no! A little puppy was stuck on a high rooftop. It looked very scared. Poor puppy!
pages.imagePrompt: A small brown puppy is sitting on the edge of a rooftop, looking down sadly at the ground far below.

pages.text: Don't worry, I am here to help! May said. He felt very strong and confident.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is looking up at the rooftop with a supportive and brave smile.

pages.text: May climbed up the long, silver ladder. Climb, climb, climb! It was very high.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is carefully climbing a silver ladder, looking very focused on his rescue mission.

pages.text: He reached the puppy and gave it a soft cuddle. The puppy was warm and fuzzy.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is holding the small puppy in his arms on the rooftop, looking very glad.

pages.text: Everyone below cheered for Firefighter May. Yay! Hurray! they all shouted together.
pages.imagePrompt: A group of happy people standing on the sidewalk, clapping and waving to Firefighter May above.

pages.text: May felt very proud and happy to be a helper. Helping others is a super job!
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is standing by his fire truck, looking empowered and joyful.

pages.text: The fire truck made a low hum. Vroom! It was time to go back to the station.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is back in his fire truck, waving to the people as he drives away.

pages.text: May felt very content and safe. He was the bravest firefighter in the whole world.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is sitting quietly with a happy smile, feeling very good about his day.

pages.text: Goodnight, Firefighter May. Sleep tight with your hero helmet nearby. You did great!
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. A peaceful image of May sleeping soundly in his bed after his big rescue.
